item.title: John Roderick
item.description: John Roderick is an American musician, writer, podcaster, and politician. He is currently the lead singer and guitarist in the band The Long Winters, was formerly a touring member of the band Harvey Danger, and co-hosts the podcasts Roderick On The Line, Road Work, Omnibus, and Friendly Fire.

item.title: Chris Walla
item.description: Christopher Ryan 'Chris' Walla is an American musician, producer, and film music composer, best known for being a former guitarist and songwriter for the band Death Cab for Cutie.
